title: Washington-Rochambeau National Historic Trail: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility        National Park Service areas along the Washington-Rochambeau Revolutionary Route NHT generally meet accessibility standards for people with disabilities. However, because of the varied nature and rural character of the many certified sites making up the Washington-Rochambeau Revolutionary Route NHT, please contact individual sites about accessibility. For more information on the accessibility of these sites, look at the Things to Do page.
